界內球.definition: ball within bounds (sports); in; fair ball (baseball)

界別.definition: to divide up into different zones; (HK) sector of society; constituency; (taxonomy) kingdom

界址.definition: boundary (of a piece of land or territory)

界畫.definition: accurate depiction of architectural forms with the aid of a ruler (technique of Chinese art); picture created using this technique

界首.definition: Jieshou, county-level city in Fuyang 阜陽|阜阳[Fu4 yang2], Anhui

界首市.definition: Jieshou, county-level city in Fuyang 阜陽|阜阳[Fu4 yang2], Anhui
